title: Jacob Blesses Ephraim and Manasseh
summary: Genesis 48 describes how Jacob blesses Joseph’s sons, Ephraim and Manasseh, giving them a special inheritance. He intentionally places his right hand on Ephraim, the younger, giving him the greater blessing.

faq.question: Why was Joseph surprised during the blessing?
faq.answer: Because Jacob gave the greater blessing to Ephraim, the younger son, instead of Manasseh, the firstborn.

faq.question: What did Jacob say about Ephraim and Manasseh?
faq.answer: That they would be like his own sons and receive a portion of the inheritance among Jacob’s tribes.
